```{r}

library(exscidata); library(tidyverse)
data("hypertrophy")
glimpse(hypertrophy)


dat <- hypertrophy %>%
  select(PARTICIPANT, DXA_LBM_T1:DXA_LBM_T3, TESTOSTERONE_T1:TESTOSTERONE_T3) %>%
  
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(testoavg. = mean(c(TESTOSTERONE_T1, TESTOSTERONE_T2, TESTOSTERONE_T3))) %>%
  
  ungroup() %>%
  
  mutate(DXA_change = DXA_LBM_T3 - DXA_LBM_T1) %>%
  
  select(PARTICIPANT, testoavg., DXA_change) %>%
  
  print()
  
  pivot_wider(names_from = variable, 
              values_from = value) %>%
  
  pivot_wider(names_from = time,
             values_from = c(DXA, TESTOSTERONE)) %>%
  
  
  
  pivot_wider()

  print()


# Fit the model

m1 <- lm(DXA_change ~ TESTOSTERONE_T3, data = dat)

summary(m1) 




#Reg.

 hypertrophy %>%
   filter(time  "T1", "T2", "T3") %>%
        select(PARTICIPANT, TESTOSTERONE, DXA) %>%
         ggplot(aes(TESTOSTERONE, DXA1)) + geom_point(size = 3, fill = "lightblue", shape = 21) +
         theme_minimal()
 
 print()
 
 
```
